note: sh-b-t) actually means “cease”: after six days’ creative activity, God stopped working.
title: The word that is normally translated as “rest
Since the revelation at Sinai had not yet occurred, this was the people’s first encounter with the phenomenon of Sabbath rest
This point is repeated, as though for summary emphasis, in the very last chapter of the Bible
Exodus 31:12–17 combines all these themes: covenant with God, six days’ creation, violation to be punished by death
